### Proposal

I would like to officially name two officers: 

- social: @aalmiray 
    Andres has already been handling social posts and announcements.
    I'd like to make this role more officially recognized

- community manager: @sigrunixia 
    I recruited Rebecca to help me with community building machinery:
    the community-management and moderation-related bits of Discord 
    and GitHub.

### Voting group

@commonhaus/cf-council

### Consensus mechanism

Please use emoji reactions to indicate your support:
- **ğŸ‘ (:+1:)** if it looks good to you
- **ğŸ‘€ (:eyes:)** if you're "ok" with it (it may not be your favorite)
- **ğŸ‘ (:-1:)** if you think this needs discussion first

Ask questions or raise concerns in comments.
